title: Free Photoshop Alternatives for Linux

proprietary.name: Adobe Photoshop
proprietary.description: The industry standard for photo editing and digital art, but expensive and not available on Linux.

alternatives.name: GIMP
alternatives.description: The most powerful free image editor. Supports layers, masks, filters, and advanced editing tools. Can open and export PSD files.

alternatives.name: Krita
alternatives.description: Designed for digital painting and illustration. Excellent brush engine and drawing tools. Great for artists and concept designers.

alternatives.name: Photopea
alternatives.description: Browser-based editor that looks and works like Photoshop. No installation required. Excellent PSD support.

alternatives.name: Inkscape
alternatives.description: Vector graphics editor, similar to Adobe Illustrator. Best for logos, icons, and scalable graphics.

verdict: GIMP is the most complete Photoshop replacement for photo editing. Krita is better for digital painting and illustration. For quick edits without installing software, Photopea works great in your browser.

seo.title: Free Photoshop Alternatives for Linux | GIMP, Krita & More
seo.description: Best free Photoshop alternatives for Linux. Compare GIMP, Krita, Photopea, and Inkscape. Professional image editing without subscriptions.
